body:
Improvements over the previous version of the package:
- adds variant support for different process managers (`slurm`, `hydra`, `gforker`, `remshell`)
- adds variant support for different network types

Still lacks CUDA support. The url for version `1.9` and `2.0` seems to be broken and were kept only for compatibility reasons.
title: packages/mvapich2 : added support for process managers and network types
